name: Brick Breaker: R3TRO EDITION
description:
A very short Breakout clone. Features only four levels, but still fairly entertaining for a few minutes of gameplay. 

Sadly, the highest score achievable is 119 as that's the total number of bricks in the game. There are green life power-ups that have a randomized 25% chance of falling whenever any given brick is broken.

As with all my early games, I do not claim any ownership over the audio featured in this game.
